title: Mastering Aptosnames (ANS)
description: Learn about Aptosnames, the first domain name service for the Aptos blockchain that allows you to register and manage .apt domains to replace long wallet addresses with human-readable names.

tasks.title: Prepare for Domain Registration
tasks.description: Add at least 0.05 APT to your wallet to prepare for domain service usage

tasks.title: ANS Basics
tasks.description: Learn the fundamentals of the Aptosnames service
tasks.question: What is the primary purpose of Aptosnames (ANS)?
options: Replace wallet addresses with human-readable names
tasks.correctAnswer: Replace wallet addresses with human-readable names

tasks.title: Domain Extensions
tasks.question: What is the standard domain extension used by Aptosnames?

tasks.title: Domain Registration
tasks.description: Learn about the domain registration process
tasks.question: What is the minimum registration period for an Aptosnames domain?

tasks.title: Domain Functionality
tasks.description: Understanding what you can do with an Aptosnames domain
tasks.question: Which of the following is NOT a feature of Aptosnames domains?
options: Use as your username across Aptos dApps
Receive tokens to your domain name instead of address
Link to your social media profiles

tasks.title: Subdomain Support
tasks.description: Learn about subdomains in the ANS ecosystem
tasks.question: What is a benefit of creating subdomains?
options: They allow domain owners to create specialized addresses under their domain
tasks.correctAnswer: They allow domain owners to create specialized addresses under their domain

tasks.title: Technical Implementation
tasks.description: Understanding the technical details of ANS
tasks.question: How are Aptosnames domains stored on the Aptos blockchain?
options: As Move resources with owner rights

tasks.title: Reverse Resolution
tasks.description: Learn about reverse resolution in domain services
tasks.question: What does 'reverse resolution' refer to in Aptosnames?
options: Transferring a domain back to the marketplace
Converting a domain name back to a wallet address
Displaying your domain when someone looks up your wallet address
tasks.correctAnswer: Displaying your domain when someone looks up your wallet address

tasks.title: Domain Integration
tasks.description: Understanding how ANS integrates with other services
tasks.question: Which of these wallets has native support for Aptosnames?
